title: Authors and Citation
text: Staley J, Windmeijer F, Suderman M, Lyon M, Davey Smith G, Tilling K (2022). “robust mean variance test application high-dimensional phenotypes.” European Journal Epidemiology, 37(4), 377–387. doi:10.1007/s10654-021-00805-w.
code: @Article{jlst,   author = {J.R. Staley and F. Windmeijer and M. Suderman and M.S. Lyon and G. {Davey Smith} and K. Tilling},   title = {A robust mean and variance test with application to high-dimensional phenotypes},   year = {2022},   doi = {10.1007/s10654-021-00805-w},   journal = {European Journal of Epidemiology},   volume = {37},   number = {4},   pages = {377--387}, }

title: Joint location-and-scale tests
text: package used fit joint mean (location) variance (scale) tests, .e. joint location--scale tests. package also functions perform variability tests using Breusch-Pagan Brown-Forsythe methods.

title: Joint location-and-scale tests
text: jlssc: joint location--scale score test. jlsp: joint location--scale test using Fisher’s method. vartest: variability tests Breusch-Pagan Brown-Forsythe methods.

title: Joint location-and-scale tests
code: # Libraries library(jlst)  # Data   x <- rbinom(1000, 1, 0.5) y <- 0.5 + 0.025 * x + rnorm(1000, 0, sqrt(0.005 * x)) + rnorm(1000, 0, 0.1)  # Variance test   vartest(y, x = as.factor(x), type = 1) # Breusch-Pagan test vartest(y, x = as.factor(x), type = 2) # Brown-Forsythe test  # Joint location-and-scale test using Fisher's method jlsp(y, x = as.factor(x), var.type = 1) # Breusch-Pagan variance test jlsp(y, x = as.factor(x), var.type = 2) # Brown-Forsythe variance test  # Joint location-and-scale score test    jlssc(y, x = as.factor(x), type = 1) # Breusch-Pagan (BP) variance test jlssc(y, x = as.factor(x), type = 2) # Brown-Forsythe (BF) variance test jlssc(y, x = as.factor(x), type = 3) # Method of moments version of the test with the BP variance test jlssc(y, x = as.factor(x), type = 4) # Method of moments version of the test with the BF variance test

title: Joint location-and-scale tests
text: Staley JR, Windmeijer F, et al. robust mean variance test application high-dimensional phenotypes. Eur J Epidemiol 2022;37(4):377-387.

what: Joint location-and-scale test using Fisher's method — jlsp
title: Joint location-and-scale test using Fisher's method — jlsp
text: jlsp performs joint location--scale test using Fisher's method.

title: Joint location-and-scale test using Fisher's method — jlsp
code: jlsp(y, x, covar = NULL, covar.var = FALSE, var.type = 1, x.sq = FALSE)

title: Joint location-and-scale test using Fisher's method — jlsp
text: y vector outcome values x vector exposure values covar data.frame covariates covar.var adjust second stage (variance component) approach covariates x.sq include x-squared variance part model type type test, 1 = Breusch-Pagan variance test, 2 = Brown-Forsythe variance test (default: 1)

title: Joint location-and-scale test using Fisher's method — jlsp
text: jlsp returns list results: Q / F test statistic DF degrees freedom P p-value

title: Joint location-and-scale test using Fisher's method — jlsp
Joint location-and-scale test using Fisher's method — jlsp
Joint location-and-scale test — jlssc
text: jlssc performs joint location--scale score test.

title: Joint location-and-scale test — jlssc
code: jlssc(y, x, covar = NULL, type = 1, x.sq = FALSE, x.reg = TRUE)

title: Joint location-and-scale test — jlssc
text: y vector outcome values x vector exposure values covar data.frame covariates type type test, 1 = Breusch-Pagan variance test, 2 = Brown-Forsythe variance test, 3 = Method moments version test 1, 4 = Method moments version test 2] (default: 1) x.sq include x-squared model x.reg regress covariates exposure terms

title: Joint location-and-scale test — jlssc
text: jlst returns data.frame results: Q test statistic DF degrees freedom P p-value

title: Variability tests — vartest
text: vartest performs variability tests either Breusch-Pagan Brown-Forsythe methods.

title: Variability tests — vartest
code: vartest(y, x, covar = NULL, covar.var = FALSE, type = 1, x.sq = FALSE)

title: Variability tests — vartest
text: y vector outcome values x vector exposure values covar data.frame covariates covar.var adjust second stage (variance component) approach covariates type type test, 1 = Breusch-Pagan variance test, 2 = Brown-Forsythe variance test (default: 1) x.sq include x-squared variance part model

title: Variability tests — vartest
text: vartest returns list results: coef model coefficients variance part model test data.frame test results F: test statistic DF: degrees freedom P: p-value
